module.p:
-(a)il is a suffix used to create derived adjectives from nouns –
aintighearna despot, tyrant ⇒ aintighearnail despotic, tyrannical
deich ten, 10 ⇒ deicheil decimal
deich bliadhna ten years ⇒ deich-bhliadhnail decennial, every ten years
eaglais
church ⇒ eaglaiseil
ecclesiastical
fear man ⇒ fearail manly
caraid friend ⇒ càirdeil friendly
manach monk ⇒ manachail monastic, monkish
mì-loinn inelegance ⇒ mì-loinneil inelegant
mì-mhodh discourtesy ⇒ mì-mhodhail discourteous, rude (also mìomhail)
mì-rian disorder, confusion ⇒ mì-rianail confusion, disorderly
mì-thaing ingratitude ⇒ mì-thaingeil ungrateful
sagart priest ⇒ sagartail priestly
slàinte health ⇒ slàinteil sanitary
